messages.message: having some issues with local dev and the new nginx setup -> i’m running the webapp with `make build runlocal RELAOD=true LEGACY=true` and webpack with `make build-local.` when i change js files, i’m seeing the webpack bundle rebuild, but the changes aren’t reflected in the UI. i’m wondering if it’s not proxying correctly to localhost:8080? or i’m doing something else wrong (incredibly possible)?
If reload is a typo in the command you are running it won’t work
But that might just be here
